text: I recently discovered a tech documentary youtube channel called ColdFusion, through two videos on the rise and fall of intel. Specifically on the latter it mentioned how turning to business-minded people at the top may have been a major factor for its decline. Pretty interesting stuff ~~

elements.text: I recently discovered a tech documentary youtube channel called ColdFusion, through two videos on the rise and fall of intel. Specifically on the latter it mentioned how turning to business-minded people at the top may have been a major factor for its decline. Pretty interesting stuff ~~

text: Seems like a pattern, like with Boeing. Finance people controlling a company turns the company from a thing-maker into a shareholder-enricher.

elements.text: Seems like a pattern, like with Boeing. Finance people controlling a company turns the company from a thing-maker into a shareholder-enricher.

text: you might also enjoy the content of youtube channels lik Lemmino (mostly mystery docs) and Business Casual (stories of companies/businessmen)
